attributes.action: Consider implementing a national telephone number (for example 555) to contact the police in a non-emergency situation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present non-emergency numbers are often long and unmemorable and to make matters worse different numbers are used in different regions. A large percentage of calls made to 999 are not emergency calls. They are made because the caller needs to contact the police but does not know which number to call.
